website_summaries.verdict: Portable and wall-mountable CD player. Good sound and can be used as a Bluetooth speaker or FM radio.
pros: Works with CD, CD-R, CD-RW, MP3, and WMA formats
Mount it in your house or take it with you on the go
cons: Some buttons on the remote control are unreliable

customer_reviews.title: Works but...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! For some reason I thought CDS would slide in through a side slot or something, but they actually just go right in front with no door and a way to close them in, so I could actually touch the CD while it's playing if U chose to. I don't know how I feel about the eye and laser being open and exposed when a CD isn't in it but that's not such an awful thing I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda L.

customer_reviews.title: Will stream from Alexa. Update...remote fell apart after a week.
customer_reviews.text: Update: exactly one year later, with very light use, it no longer plays cds. Keeps switching to bluetooth no longer usable for anything but bluetooth. Disappointed. Remote lasted a week and then fell apart. To answer my own question, yes, it can be paired with Alexa for streaming. (I had read that some devices will not connect.) I also had no trouble pairing with an Lg V20. The remote seems quirky, though it may be the battery. The sound quality is satisfactory. Please note that my video was to show bluetooth cooperation with Alexa, not as a means to consider sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: 🙊🙉🙈

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when we first got it. I used it in my daughters room and it was perfect. But then it stopped working and would suddenly just play static. She would wake up from the static noise. I cleaned the CD (which was also brand new) tried other CD’s and the same thing. And of course it was after my date to return. Very disappointed. Wouldn’t buy this product again nor recommend purchasing it. Should’ve gone old school CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound, no protection for CD, stand doesn't securely hold device
customer_reviews.text: You would think that this is simple to use but that's not true. Cons: 1st: There is no cover for your CD. 2nd: Cord attached to device is flimsy. 3rd: Adjusting between BlueTooth to CD to FM is just not smooth. 4th: Biggest problem I have is the sound. WORST PART! My tiny $5 bluetooth speaker sounds louder and clearer. 5th: The stand for it doesn't secure the device. In fact, the device slips off easily. When you have children playing around & the CD is on it, one fall is all it'll take to crack that CD, because there's no protection for it. The stand doesn't secure the device in place.
customer_reviews.author: Broni

customer_reviews.title: Works well. I wish it has a cover to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I wish it has a cover to protect the CD while it's mounted and playing. The symbols on the buttons are very hard to see; they should made visible at least with a different color such as white on black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It stopped playing CDs. Only used it a handful of times in the 9 months I've had it, and now can't get it to work at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: skipping a lot after just 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about 6 months ago to listen to books on CD in the car. At first it worked really well but would skip occasionally. I stopped using it for a couple of months and now that I am using it again it is skipping a lot. Sometimes it will jump ahead, sometimes jump back, the CD spins and spins and nothing plays. It is now outside the return window so I don't know that there is anything I can do.
customer_reviews.author: anuradha

customer_reviews.title: Sound quarlity is good, can be used in multiple purposes such as ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quarlity is good, can be used in multiple purposes such as playing yoga music with Bluetooth connect to my phone. It is good choice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: shirley lin

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Cuz it hangs up on the wall it's it of the way. It looks pretty chill too. I Love how it has Bluetooth cuz nobody's CDs anymore. it could sound a little better but I can fix that. great purchase on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: Bought in May 2018, died in Feb 2020
customer_reviews.text: When my last CD player died, one that I had bought in the 1980s (around 30 years old), I replaced it with this poorly made, lightweight plastic piece of garbage, which didn't last 2 years. My recommendation: don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: LMertz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and sound is of poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on product reviews. The cd player did not work at all, the FM tuner had poor sound quality. The manual is poorly written and unclear. It also took an extraordinarily long time to ship. I usually don't have trouble with most Amazon products but this is the clear exception.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Mora

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts and didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work, had to return it. It couldn’t read CDs, just kept making a skipping sound under the CD. Remote only worked right in front of the unit and facing it at just the right angle. I would not recommend. Cool idea, but too cheap parts unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Hessbamboo

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: My Mother is in a nursing home but loves to listen to her CD’s. I got this for her and she loves it! So easy for her to use, and I mounted it on her wall by her bed. It comes with a remote so can be on from anywhere in the room. Everyone that comes into her room ask about it, so she gets to “show off” and tell all about it. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Awwsome
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Our Library soon will be switching to mp3 cd's due to the cost saving over past audio cd's offered. Sound, remote and easy use has worked for myself and the elderly. I have not yet hooked up via Bluetooth but I think that would be a nice feature also. Not only would I buy again, ( if needed ) I have sold 3.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, no CD format limits
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying such a CD player. Last time it was a very similar one, which was a good blurtooth speaker and radio, but not a good CD player. It limited the CD formats and many of my CDs could not be played. I just returned it. And this time, I tried this one, it does make me very satisfied. I do love the sound quality and nice look, which makes my living room neat and feel comfortable. I use it to play music CDs, and I also used radio and speaker function a lot. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: yaoxue wei

customer_reviews.title: not useful in mobile applicationI, use as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Seller refunded the purchase price even though I had kept the item beyond the refund window. I wanted to return this because this player does not work well in a moving vehicle on rough roads. It has good sound quality and is probably great in the shower or deployed in other static settings.
customer_reviews.author: P. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for listening to CDs in the car!
customer_reviews.text: Cars don't come with CD players any more but sometimes a person wants to play a few of those old CDs. This one plugs into the USB port and works with a remote. Great idea and nice to be able to listen to CDs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: update -- broke after 2 years.,,
customer_reviews.text: very neat and good sound. Radio/USB/CD can be enjoyed anywhere I go. It looks like a toy, but I am happy with this player and use it every day!! : update after two years use --- remote controller stopped working and side button's mode change is not working, and I just realize CD function stopped as well. Chat with amazon help for remote controller replacement, but they cannot contact with this seller. I paid 59USD for this and stopped working after 2 years, so be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Kite Eight

customer_reviews.title: Nice CD player with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I dislike is that when I used the Bluetooth feature and paired my tv with it, the sound from people’s voices do not sync with the player. Can this be corrected? My wife keeps it by her recliner and all we hear is echoing.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Product Broke down after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as promised. I bought on 12/22/18. Within 6 months, it no longer plays and conveniently the product support ended in March 2019. I can not find anywhere what the warranty is.
customer_reviews.author: NewMommy

customer_reviews.title: If you have children or a large dog do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The power cord is the off and on: bad idea! My cats have turned it off and on two or three times. It does not have a cover so the CD in the lasers exposed... I have a wood stove so it's just a matter of time before it self-destructs. My experience with CD players wear that they were covered up or had a casing or a cover or a lid. It has none of the above.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great CD player
customer_reviews.text: This thing has surprisingly good sound quality. My teen loves having it display cds!
customer_reviews.author: RScheffel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it - bought it for a long cruise
customer_reviews.author: Paul Druckman

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to put on the wall with a screw
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my living room. It is easy to put on the wall with a screw. The sound quality is good and is loud enough for what I need it for. It comes with a radio option which is cool. And I like the fact you have to pull the cord to turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: Portable cd player, easy to use and a fine speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cd player for myself. In good quality. Wake up in the morning, pull down the cord and my music running out. What a best day ever. It is very convenient and easy to use. I like to use it by bluetooth mode too. The speaker sounds great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen sun

customer_reviews.title: Sound is better than expected...
customer_reviews.text: Having fun listening to my older CD's on this player. I also used it for a classroom lecture, the volume was more than adequate for a classroom for 25. I did try to use it to listen to audiobooks, however had difficulty pausing and restarting where I left off. May not have been designed for this use.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: I can't get the device to play1
customer_reviews.text: Good looking device but only if it worked for me. I purchased extra batteries because I thought that the source of problem. After changing out battery, the device will still not turn-on. Help
customer_reviews.author: jglen bright

customer_reviews.title: I like most things about this product
customer_reviews.text: I like most things about this product. I like the remote the best. I wish it would show what chapter I am on in an audiobook. I just have to keep forwarding to find my place sometimes. Overnight it resets and I lose my place sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at Excellent price
customer_reviews.text: My 92 year old mother uses it with no help so ya think it is simple to use? It is small and light weight. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: but am annoyed that you need a power screwdriver to install the ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't started playing it yet, but am annoyed that you need a power screwdriver to install the wall mount. Hello, apt. dwellers don't have power tools. Plus the desk stand is NOT functional.....have no idea why it's in with the player. There is no cover for the CD while it's playing, which I find very odd.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Burris

customer_reviews.title: cute design, awful performance
customer_reviews.text: it's really cute, don't get me wrong. i enjoy the minimal design and how small it is, but the sound quality is absolutely horrid. it makes the music sound very muffled and muddy, if you could imagine muddy being a sound. the volume of it isn't an issue, but the quality of the audio is awful (note, im using official music CDs, not a third party download)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to have in the car when the new cars don’t have CD players.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad to play his cds after discovering his new car didn’t have a CD player. Once you realize the on / off switch is a pull string your good to go! Now he’s happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Great potential ..but has it's flaws
customer_reviews.text: CD player has so much potential...problems are that when you skip to next song...you find yourself in the middle of the next song, not at the beginning. Also, sound quality could be much better. A bit pricey for having such issues.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I don't like using the remote as it comes with the button ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were a Play button directly on the device. I don't like using the remote as it comes with the button batteries inside which are poisonous to kids if swallowed.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: What more need to say!
customer_reviews.text: What more need to say! Design is the best. The product is excellent in completeness.
customer_reviews.author: rina

customer_reviews.title: I Like It!
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact this is. Sound quality isn't excellent . . . but for the price it's quite good. Since my new car doesn't have a CD player in it, I'm hoping to use it there.
customer_reviews.author: ClarityBarb

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: I'll give them 4 stars because of the idea. Has some good features. But unless you hook up up to a speaker it's worthless. Aux cord it came with doesn't work. I like how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CD Player stopped reading after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: CD Player stopped playing CDs after 2 months. The CDs would spin but kept changing speed and then shut off before playing at all. FM and Aux still works but I got it specifically to play CDs. Don't waste your money like I did. Get the warranty if you gamble on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not wall mount. Works as well desk top. Easy controls, good quality listening
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: This is a convenient cd player!
customer_reviews.text: I was sold on it for the wall-mountable feature. It took awhile for me to install and use but I don't have any complaints EXCEPT "why no cover " except for the card board?
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really a fun Cd player! Portable, nice looking, and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cole

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: gets it off y bedside table...must hang it to use pull cord effectively
customer_reviews.author: G.Young

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: My first impression is the packing looks in good quality, the sound is ok, it comes with a white slim remote control, audio cable, wall mounts and stand. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Honest

customer_reviews.title: Multimedia player
customer_reviews.text: Bough it as a gift to my dad as a gift because he love music and would play them all day. It easy easy to use, you could stream musical from Cd or your phone. Best part is you can even use it to receive FM
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but trouble skipping ahead to songs
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but sometimes it doesn’t know where the songs start. If I skip to the next song, it will start in the middle. Even if I hit song 6, it will start in the middle. Not quite what I had in mind but the sound quality is great. ADD: it also randomly shuts off mid-song. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It has only ok sound quality, but functional. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but won't last
customer_reviews.text: Update: exactly 4 months later, with very light use, it no longer plays cds. No longer usable for anything but bluetooth. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Von Borstel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was excepting! bought this for a gift for my dad and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Promari

customer_reviews.title: ... sure how Bluetooth works but otherwise the sound is pretty amazing for such a small portable
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how Bluetooth works but otherwise the sound is pretty amazing for such a small portable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Works well for my daughters age 6 and 4. Seems very solid so far with couple of times falling on the floor and still working as new.
customer_reviews.author: Aschaeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, comes with a stand in case you don’t want to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: mickeymors

customer_reviews.title: Works well and I love watching the CD spin
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I love watching the CD spin. Haven't tried out the other functions, but the CD and USB work well. The sound is slightly scratchy but I didn't expect it to have a beautiful sound system. It's exactly what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but not long lasting quality
customer_reviews.text: Cool item for a baby room. Easy to use. Nevertheless, not a long lasting gadjet.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work! Completely broken and haven't been able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work! Completely broken and haven't been able to use. I installed this and it was defective immediately. Worked 1x and then has never worked again Do not buy this product! RETURNED THIS and was not refunded either. Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Adair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s sleek and elegant. Remember to pull the cord to turn on/off.
customer_reviews.author: G. Alamo

customer_reviews.title: There’s no way to return it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine appx. 6 months. I listen to books on it and it has quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Roete

customer_reviews.title: Non
customer_reviews.text: Volumen to low you can’t pause it manually has to be with control
customer_reviews.author: salvador murillo

customer_reviews.title: This Player blows all others out of the water
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Pairs well with speakers. Portable. Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying a second one - great sound, easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: cbor22

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work—Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all. Would never buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This allowed me to play CDs in my auto. ...
customer_reviews.text: This allowed me to play CDs in my auto. For some reason, it wouldn’t work by Bluetooth, but did via cable
customer_reviews.author: Mervyn Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 2 days and it’s not working no more
customer_reviews.author: Margarete r.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: We love this CD player! Sleek, easy to use, and exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wise

customer_reviews.title: I am able to turn off TV and enjoy cooking while listening to the many lovely CDs from ...
customer_reviews.text: This a neat addition to my kitchen. I am able to turn off TV and enjoy cooking while listening to the many lovely CDs from my childhood/teen era. My only complaint is that volume isn't as loud as I'd like it. Regardless of that, it is a wonderful addition.
customer_reviews.author: Flo C Blak

customer_reviews.title: overall great purchase, although Sound quality not as aesthetically bueno
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is lower than expected although still looks fantastic and operates great
customer_reviews.author: graham

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work after one use. Don't waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Ahles

customer_reviews.title: A total piece of garbage. Waste my precious time
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't even deserve 1 star. It doesn't work at all, Plugging in- no sign of life, pressing any button- no sign of life, A total piece of garbage. Waste my precious time. Returning it right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same as I have expected.
customer_reviews.text: I want to buy a CD player for a long time since I don't want my son always to watch videos. For a toddler under two years old, I hope he can listen to more music than watch videos. The functionality is easy to use. The CD player has the Bluetooth that you can connect to your phone or computer. The sound quality is good. Same thought with other buyers, just hope it can have a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Charl

customer_reviews.title: Product only last 4 weeks before it broke
customer_reviews.text: We thought this was the needed product for our teenager's room. That was until it broke and quit spinning CD's within 4 weeks of having it on the wall. And now it's beyond the return window. I would advise against ordering this product and getting stuck with it like us!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Jones

product_meta.title: Portable cd Player, Alice Dreams Wall mountable Wireless CD Music Player Bluetooth Speaker MP3 Player with Remote Control and MP3 3.5MM Headphone Audio Jack AUX Input/Output (White)
product_meta.description:
★The Feature★
● Best Gift and Keeper- The CD player is best gift and keeper for the children, older, gravida and so on. No the electromagnetic radiation, no the unhealthy content and the simple operation. 
●Great Sound Quality and Used Widly-The CD player also is special for Yoga, accompaniment for dance, unborn bady, party and so on.The sound is very excellent, it will bring the nice music time to you.
●Portable CD Player for Wall and Stand- The cd player is portable for wall mountable, you can be easy to fix it on the wall. And it is with a stand that you can player the music on the desk,sofa and ourdoor.
● Top Quality and Best Serve- The CD player has the high quality, we have checked all of the CD player befor we selling. If there is any problem, please feel free to contact to us, we will try our best to help you.And in a mounth, we supply the full refund for any reason.

★Specification★
●Disc format support: CD, CD-R, CD-RW, MP3, WMA.
●Radio frequency: 87.5KHZ-108.0MHZ
●Speaker: 45mm*2
●Rated Impedance: 4Ω
●Speaker output: 3W*2
●Power supply: AC100V-220V,50HZ/60HZ
●Power/Switch cable length: 2.4m

★Function★ 
●Cable-pulling switch: pull the power cable to turn on/turn off.
●USB flash reading/playing
●Full-band FM radio.
●Bluetooth connection.
●Remote control.
●Standard 3.5mm input/output audio port, connecting earphone/speaker.
●Support both mode of single song loop and whole disc loop.
●Support A-B repeat

★ Package Content★
✔1 x CD player
✔1 x Remote control
✔1 x Wall-mounted kit
✔1 x Wall-mounted plate
✔1 x CD player stand(tablet stand)
✔1 x User manual

📀 【Best Gift and Keeper】The CD player is very suited for learning and listening music, the beautiful contour and the simple operation, it is the best gift for the children and older.And it is very pretty for the gravida,because it is no the electromagnetic radiation. The CD player also is special for Yoga, accompaniment for dance, unborn bady, party and so on. The best gift and keeper is worth to choose.
📀 【Remote Control】The CD player control through a remote. The volume,loop,A-B repeal and the modes (CD/MP3/FM/Bluetooth) are be controlled through it.

📀 【Portable CD Player】The player is wall mountable, you can find a compatible place in the living room, bedroom and study. It is also with a stand up, you can play the music on the desk, sofa and outdoor.

📀 【Top Quality and Best Service】The wall CD player has the highly quality, the finish ,sound and the design are excellent.If it has any problem with it, you can feel free to contact to us, we will serve you all the time. In a month, we can full refund for any reason.
